message: Customer: My Running Shoes X1 fell apart. I ran 3 miles and the sole started to separate. Photo sent. Agent: We're sorry; this looks like a manufacturing defect
Customer: Yoga mat is too small. I ordered size L. Agent: Did you check the size chart? Customer: The chart is confusing — says 180cm = L but I measured 170cm and it still fits small
Customer: Earbuds won’t pair. Tried resetting. Agent: Please try pairing and send serial number. Customer: Serial 3321-XX — unit returns recommended
Customer: The yoga mat smells like chemicals. Agent: Did you let it air out? Customer: Smell caused nausea, returned immediately
Customer: Scale shows weight +4lbs vs pharmacy. Customer measured several times; suspect calibration issue. Agent: We'll issue RMA
Customer: Packaging was missing strap. Agent: Sorry — the unit was shipped incomplete. We will send replacement
Customer: Smell is present and causes skin rash. Agent: Ask medical details; escalate to QC/Materials
Customer: Shoes small but ordered 10.5; Agent: We recommend checking size chart; multiple returns flagged for same SKU
Customer: XL fits like XXL — pattern error. Agent: Size gradation seems inconsistent; escalate to product team
Customer: Received wrong color. Agent: Confirmed wrong SKU shipped. Agent: Initiate shipping audit
